testcase.name: CRM create a new deal
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is Cogmento CRM....................................passed Then user enters username and user enters password..........................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on Home Page...................................................passed Then user clicks on Deals link..............................................passed Then user clicks on New button..............................................passed Then user is on AddNewDeals Page............................................passed Then user enters deal details...............................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
